data.name: AuditLoggingServiceCollectionExtensions_NoAuditStoreRegistrationFound
data.value: No IAuditStore registration found. Call AddAuditLogging() before AddRbacAuditStore().

data.name: DefaultAuditLogger_IntegrityVerificationCompleted
data.value: Audit integrity verification completed successfully. Verified {EventCount} events.

data.name: DefaultAuditLogger_IntegrityVerificationError
data.value: Error during audit integrity verification from {StartDate:O} to {EndDate:O}

data.name: DefaultAuditLogger_IntegrityVerificationFailed
data.value: Audit integrity verification FAILED. First violation at event {EventId}: {Description}

data.name: DefaultAuditLogger_LogAuditEventFailed
data.value: Failed to log audit event {EventId} of type {EventType}

data.name: DefaultAuditLogger_LoggedAuditEvent
data.value: Logged audit event {EventId} of type {EventType} for actor {ActorId}

data.name: DefaultAuditLogger_StartDateAfterEndDate
data.value: Start date must be before or equal to end date.

data.name: DefaultAuditLogger_StartingIntegrityVerification
data.value: Starting audit integrity verification from {StartDate:O} to {EndDate:O}

data.name: RbacAuditStore_AccessEventDenied
data.value: User with role {Role} attempted to access event {EventId} of type {EventType}

data.name: RbacAuditStore_IntegrityPermissionsRequired
data.value: Insufficient permissions for audit integrity verification. ComplianceOfficer or Administrator role required.

data.name: RbacAuditStore_MetaAuditLogFailed
data.value: Failed to log meta-audit event for action {Action}

data.name: RbacAuditStore_ReadPermissionsRequired
data.value: Insufficient permissions for audit log access. SecurityAnalyst, ComplianceOfficer, or Administrator role required.

data.name: RbacAuditStore_VerifyIntegrityDenied
data.value: User with role {Role} attempted to verify audit integrity
